# your-cookie

```bash
npm i your-cookie
```

### cookie

Cookie 操作

详细文档 https://www.npmjs.com/package/js-cookie

```js
import cookie from 'your-cookie'

cookie.set('name', 'value')
cookie.set('name', 'value', {expires: 7, path: ''})
cookie.get('name')
cookie.getJSON()
cookie.getJSON('name')
cookie.remove('name', {path: ''})
```
